data.title: Hope's Bridal & Prom
data.meta_description: Eastern Iowa's bridal and formal wear leader with hundreds of wedding dresses and prom dresses in two locations (Atkins + Davenport) & over 45 years of service!
data.text:
Visit Hope's Bridal's two locations to try hundreds of wedding dresses in every style you can imagine! Say YES to your perfect gown and become a part of our Hope's family!

Hope's carries hundreds of unique designer prom dresses in each location. Enjoy our fun atmosphere and caring service while finding the formal dress of your dreams!

Curvy brides rave about the selection and service they find at Hope's Bridal. Enjoy an experience that is easy and leaves you feeling confident. "Every Body. Every Bride."

We are happy to help you find the perfect styles, colors and fits to outfit your bridal party so they look and feel their best!

Visit our blog for the latest in bridal and prom fashion, expert wedding planning advice and inspiration from REAL Hope's brides!

Stay up-to-date on the latest happenings at Hope's! Don't miss our next trunk show of prom dresses or wedding dresses, community event or bridal sample sale!
